name: beast1
description:
BEAST is a cross-platform program for Bayesian analysis of molecular
sequences using MCMC.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
Binary distribution of the IBM Java Software Development Kit for big and
little-endian powerpc (power7, 8 and 9). Note: IBM is fairly aggressive
about taking down old versions, so old (and even current) versions may
not be available.

dependencies.name: libbeagle
dependencies.description:
Beagle performs genotype calling, genotype phasing, imputation of
ungenotyped markers, and identity-by-descent segment detection.
